CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 26, 1967, pg. 12, reads: "Hero and Mates - The hero of the about is Delane Howard, seen holding trophy - after hurling no-hit 13-0 victory over Sheraden, last Sunday, for the Uptown Little League team.  First row, from left - Robert Heard, Kevin Davis, Robin Rodgers, the honoree, Davis Burris, James Crawford, Larry McGee.  Second row -  Clara L. Ralls, team official; Anthony Leah, Jeffrey Rudolph, Kenneth Wiley, Larry Davis, Gregory Thomas. Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Uptown Little League baseball players from Astros, Braves and Cardinals "Cards" teams, holding large pennant reading "Pennsylvania Dist. 5 1967 Champions," first row from left: Robert Heard, Kevin Davis, Robin Rodgers, Delane Howard holding trophy, Davis Burris, James Crawford, Larry McGee; second row: official Clara L. Ralls, Anthony Leah, Jeffrey Rudolph, Kenneth Wiley, Larry Davis, and Gregory Thomas
